name: higgsboson
description: Higgsboson class components is a set of classes to style core native components.

scripts.develop:captain-america: npm run set:theme:captain-america npm run develop
scripts.develop:caramel: npm run set:theme:caramel npm run develop
scripts.develop: cross-env npx postcss ./src/themes/%THEME%/index.css --use postcss-preset-env postcss-import postcss-extend autoprefixer postcss-copy-assets --output ./dist/$THEME.css --watch
scripts.build:captain-america: npm run set:theme:captain-america npm run build
scripts.build:caramel: npm run set:theme:caramel npm run build
scripts.build: cross-env npx postcss ./src/themes/$THEME/index.css --use postcss-preset-env postcss-import postcss-extend postcss-csso  autoprefixer postcss-copy-assets --output ./dist/captain-america.min.css
